subject: Re: [junit] Failed to invoke suite(): java.lang.NullPointerException
msgSnippet: ... There is no reason to code this suite() method. JUnit does this automatically. Only code the suite() method if you need to build a test suite /different/
messageBody:
boyfrnd007 wrote:

> public static TestSuite suite()
> {
> return new TestSuite GetndSetAlertPropertiesTest.class);
> }
> This is what my code looks like. I dont know why am i getting this
> error. I checked the output folder and it does contain the class
> file. I have the same structure for many other files but for some
> reason this one is stuck. Any help would be appreciated. Thanks!

There is no reason to code this suite() method. JUnit does this
automatically. Only code the suite() method if you need to build a test
suite /different/ from the default one.

Besides, we can't tell from the above code, since it doesn't even compile.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
